original_title: Birds of the Backyard: Spring in to Summer
overview: Nature at its finest is embodied in the spring and summer splendor of songbirds in the backyard. George Harrison, author of the classic best seller The Backyard Bird Watcher, presents a backyard nature video adventure featuring Americas favorite songbirds singing, courting, nesting and raising young.
tagline: A revolutionary dimension in nature video entertainment.
title: Birds of the Backyard: Spring in to Summer
